title: Deplatforming Democrats

itunes:title: Deplatforming Democrats
itunes:author: Josh Holmes, Comfortably Smug, Michael Duncan
itunes:summary: The fellas talk about the liberal campaign against Joe Rogan, GoFundMe deplatforming Canadian truckers, and NBC doing PR for the CCP before welcoming Arizona gubernatorial candidate Karrin Taylor Robson for an interview.
